channel.title: Need help creating a new home area
channel.description: like if the home is edge i wanan chage it to like varrock ho i do this please help thanks for reading to ;D

item.title: Need help creating a new home area
item.dc:creator: @jesse9294 jesse9294
item.source: Need help creating a new home area

item.title: Need help creating a new home area
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

[quote=“jesse9294, post:6, topic:231685”][quote author=Project Evolution link=topic=305178.msg2445602#msg2445602 date=1221702105]
Search in Player.java for,

        // initial x and y coordinates of the player

Once you see it look down a bit and you will see,

teleportToX = 2852; teleportToY = 3591;
Its not exact but thats how it should look like. Just change the 2852 and 3591.

If you dont know how to find coordinates, go in-game into your server. And stand in the spot you want the new coordinates to be. Put in ::mypos.
[/quote]
Yeah he is right it is in player.java for starter spot. But you have to go to cleint.java to change the place for the ::home command. Also you might wanna make the new home a safe zone.[/quote]
If he requests it i’ll do that too.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help creating a new home area

item.title: Need help creating a new home area
item.dc:creator: @jesse9294 jesse9294
item.description:
@jesse9294 wrote:

[quote=“Project Evolution, post:3, topic:231685”]Search in Player.java for,

        // initial x and y coordinates of the player

Once you see it look down a bit and you will see,

teleportToX = 2852; teleportToY = 3591;
Its not exact but thats how it should look like. Just change the 2852 and 3591.

If you dont know how to find coordinates, go in-game into your server. And stand in the spot you want the new coordinates to be. Put in ::mypos.[/quote]
Yeah he is right it is in player.java for starter spot. But you have to go to cleint.java to change the place for the ::home command. Also you might wanna make the new home a safe zone.

item.title: Need help creating a new home area
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Search in Player.java for,

        // initial x and y coordinates of the player

Once you see it look down a bit and you will see,

teleportToX = 2852; teleportToY = 3591;
Its not exact but thats how it should look like. Just change the 2852 and 3591.

If you dont know how to find coordinates, go in-game into your server. And stand in the spot you want the new coordinates to be. Put in ::mypos.

Read full topic
